#include <ti/common/mmwave_error.h>

Data Structures

struct  ESM_NotifyParams_t
 Parameters used to register the ESM notify function to handle Group1 and Group2 errors. The notify function will be invoked post the ESM FIQ interrupt handler processing. More...
 

Macros

#define ESM_EINVAL   (MMWAVE_ERRNO_ESM_BASE-1)
 Error Code: Invalid argument.
 
#define ESM_ENOINIT   (MMWAVE_ERRNO_ESM_BASE-2)
 Error Code: Operation cannot be done as ESM_init is not done.
 
#define ESM_EREINIT   (MMWAVE_ERRNO_ESM_BASE-3)
 Error Code: Operation cannot be done as ESM_init is already done and re-init is not permitted.
 
#define ESM_ENOMEM   (MMWAVE_ERRNO_SOC_BASE-4)
 Error Code: Out of memory.
 

Typedefs

typedef void * ESM_Handle
 ESM module handle returned by the ESM_init() API call.
 
typedef void(* ESM_CallBack) (void *arg)
 Callback function which is invoked by the ESM module if a notify function is registered using the ESM_registerNotifier() API. More...
 
typedef struct ESM_NotifyParams_t ESM_NotifyParams
 Parameters used to register the ESM notify function to handle Group1 and Group2 errors. The notify function will be invoked post the ESM FIQ interrupt handler processing.
